item.title: Barclays ups guidance, announces surprise $670 million share buyback
item.description: Barclays CEO said he looked forward to "sharing updated targets to 2028" alongside the bank's full-year earnings.

item.title: Baidu's Apollo Go plans to launch taxis with no steering wheels in Switzerland as the race for robotaxis in Europe heats up
item.description: Baidu's Apollo Go robotaxi unit plans to begin tests in Switzerland this year, with the aim of launching a public-facing service by the first quarter ...

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Netflix, Mattel, DraftKings, Intuitive Surgical & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.

item.title: Travis Kelce joins activist investor Jana Partners in push to revive Six Flags
item.description: Jana has partnered with Kelce, Glenn Murphy and Dave Habiger in a group that now holds a roughly 9% stake in the amusement park operator.

item.title: Beyond Meat soars 146% after addition to meme ETF, Walmart deal
item.description: Plant-based alternative meat company Beyond Meat will expanded distribution across the United States through an agreement with Walmart.
